summary: Bill takes Trina into his depression camp cabin. Later, just as he finds showgirl LaRue who will support him, Trina becomes pregnant.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Loretta Young|Marjorie Rambeau|Glenda Farrell|Walter Connolly|Arthur Hohl|Dickie Moore|Harry Akst|Harvey Clark|Helen Jerome Eddy|R. Henry Grey|Leonard Kibrick|Carl M. Leviness|Kendall McComas|Tony Merlo|Harold Miller|Edmund Mortimer|Henry Roquemore|Hector V. Sarno|Charles Sullivan|Harry Watson
title: Fueros humanos
